text: Nahakki thabaksing, nahakki nomba kanba amadi nahakki khaangba kanba adu eina khang-i. Nahakna phattaba mising adubu khaangba ngamde haiba ei khang-i aduga pakhonchatpasingni haijaba adubu oidi oidaba makhoising adubu nahakna chang yengkhre aduga makhoi chinthibasingni haiba nahakna khangkhre haiba adu eina khang-i.
